page.title: 15MUNERICK PRODUCTIONS
page.content: {Munerick Productions}were started in December 1980 in the Parish Church Fenstanton,by{Mrs Munford and Mrs {Catterick They were raising some money to pay for the bells.They put a bells evening on to raise some money for the {restoration fund}in the{Parish Church. The first{Feast Of Words And Music was an evening of bells and the choir and audience joined in with some songs and carols. In Christmas 1984 it was the last {Munerick production,}now{Munerick {Produtions}no longer exists. {Mrs Munford}wrote a song called {'The Sonatina' Mrs Munford}has been in ten evenings since Christmas 1980-1984. There was one mini musical evening and 5 Christmas evenings and 4 Summer evenings.
